title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
EB: When previewing the PDF, the label should disappear, but it remains visible.
SR: The display property of an item is not taking effect when set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Add a label. 2. Open the 'Properties' view. 3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' to 'none'.
